title: T206 Lake ball showing with UZIT back SGC 10 SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 Lake ball showing with UZIT back SGC 10 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed McCollum
Difficult to find back with heavy surface breaking crease through the middle of the card, well rounded corners that are also pretty dinged up, a slight rip at the bottom of the care between St. and Louis, several other smaller creases and scuffs. But it is a UZIT. Asking $700. E-mail to buy or make an offer. PayPal preferred. edmccollum@cox.net
